In study , investigator want know exercise load body exercise , like walk jogging ( Ground Reaction Forces : GRF ) , affect bone differently exercise load joint , like weight lifting ( Joint Reaction Forces : JRF ) . Participants exercise least 3 time week 6 month . Measures bone strength mass , muscular strength , aerobic fitness take begin end 6 month program . Period blood sample take future analysis blood marker .

DOC.criteria: nonsmoker generally good health physically active ( less 60 minute purposeful exercise/week ) able travel exercise facility minimum 3 times/week use glucocorticoid abnormal rest EKG angina and/or evidence acute myocardial ischemia treadmill test rest blood pressure 150 mmHg systolic 90 mmHg diastolic antiresorptive drug use last 2 year initiation treatment could impact bone metabolism ( diuretic , hormone , bine anabolic agent ) prior 6 month dualenergy xray absorptiometry ( DXA ) tscore < + 2.5 femoral neck and/or lumbar spine serum vitamin D concentration < 20 ng/mL uncontrolled thyroid disease contraindication regular exercise
